Privacy Policy

No personal data collected

lorem.video doesn't require accounts or collect any personal information.

What gets logged

  • API endpoint requests (URLs, timestamps, response codes) for monitoring and preventing abuse
  • No cookies, no third-party trackers, no third-party analytics services

Your IP address

Server logs may contain IP addresses as part of standard HTTP request logging, used only for rate limiting and abuse prevention.
